answers.answer: I'm not sure why other people are but I am on bed rest because I went into preterm labor at 31 weeks and luckily they stopped it. So now I am on bed rest till i have my little boy!
Was ur pregnancy fine up until the preterm labor point?
Cervical changes, preeclampsia, pre term labour, placenta previa.I find out tomorrow if I'm gonna be put on bedrest since I've been having contractions and dialating at 32 weeks.
Yup i was having a completely normal pregnancy and then just one day I started having contractions and turns out i was dilating. It was honestly so surprising
Same here. I had such an easy pregnancy!
There are many things. With my son i was on bedrest because of placenta previa.
That's why I try to tell everyone to enjoy their pregnancy and not take it for granted.  Thinking you may have your baby at 32 weeks was very scary for me!
I'm On Bed Rest At 26 Weeks Because My Cervix Is Softening And I Tested Positive For Preterm Labor

And theres nothing they can do to prevent it or ourselves to prevent it? Does exercise help or eating a certain way or ddrinking more water I just worry because bed rest would be difficult for me if I was told to go on it.. but im literally on my but 24/7 since I dont work
Meaning I Could Have Him Or Go Into Labor Any Week now
How did they test u for that and when?

My Obgyn Didn't Really Say Why It's Softening Idk      If She Can Really Tell Why But She Told Me To Start Walking So I Don't Gain Too Much Weight Which I Haven't Gained Too Much More Then I'm Supposed To So I Started Walking And Had Only Walked For 2-3 Nights And This Happened So Idk If Walking.Caused It Or What Happened.
I was Put On It At 34 Weeks For Preterm Labor
It Is A Vaginal Test And They Tested Me Cause I Thought I Was In Preterm Labor But Was Not! My Obgyn Said They Normally Don't Run That Test Till Your LastMonth Unless They Have A Reason to
My Cousin Had The Same Test As Me And Tested Positive And Had Her Baby A Month Later.
I don't think you can do anything to prevent it. It just happens. I was fine and one night and the next night I was having painful contractions.I showed no previous signs of preterm labour.
Yeah I tested positive for that test 3 weeks ago but he's being awesome and staying in there!
I was put on bedrest for my first trimester due to bleeding. I was spotting for like almost 2 months.

question: What usually causes them to be put on it?
title: why can people get put on bed rest??
